{"label":"Get Rule Comparison", "color":"orange", "size":"360 39", "category":"Hierarchy_CodeInGraph", "isFile":true, "fileContent":"//=============================
// THIS CODE IS GENERATED FROM:
// ../../../apps/AppReceptionist/2.1/doc/graph/AvatarReceptionist.graphml
// PLEASE DO NOT EDIT BY HAND
// VERSION:   1.0
// GENERATED: 2021-09-13
//=============================

function getRuleList_Receptionist() {
  return [

    //////////////////////
    // Define Rules
    //////////////////////

      { // RULE 31 (n0::n8): MEISY ----> Say Meisy's name
        name: 'rule31',
        index: 31,
        fanIn:  [
                  [{ src:  'actionDone',    mironName: 'update_NameDictionary',  type: 'rightHand', weight:  0.50000 },  // IS RIGHT HAND ACTION DONE
                   { src:  'previousRule',  mironName: 'rule34',                 type: 'rule',      weight:  0.50000 }], // INTERNAL STATE MEISY
                ],
        fanOut:   [{ dest: 'goal',          mironName: 'drop_Phone',             type: 'rightHand', weight:  1.00000 },  // DO RIGHT HAND ACTION
                   { dest: 'goal',          mironName: 'say_MyName',             type: 'speech',    weight:  1.00000 },  // DO SPEECH
                   { dest: 'goal',          mironName: 'open_Microphone',        type: 'rightHand', weight:  1.00000 }], // DO RIGHT HAND ACTION
      },
      { // RULE 32 (n0::n23): MEISY ----> Say how are you
        name: 'rule32',
        index: 32,
        fanIn:  [
                  [{ src:  'intention',     mironName: 'say_Hello',              type: 'speech',    weight:  0.50000 },  // IS SPEECH RECOGNIZED
                   { src:  'previousRule',  mironName: 'rule57',                 type: 'rule',      weight:  0.50000 }], // INTERNAL STATE MEISY
                ],
        fanOut:   [{ dest: 'goal',          mironName: 'ask_HowAreYou',          type: 'speech',    weight:  1.00000 }], // DO SPEECH
      },
      { // RULE 34 (n0::n33): MEISY ----> Update dictionary & start ASR
        name: 'rule34',
        index: 34,
        fanIn:  [
                  [{ src:  'previousRule',  mironName: 'rule36',                 type: 'rule',      weight:  1.00000 }], // INTERNAL STATE MEISY
                ],
        fanOut:   [{ dest: 'goal',          mironName: 'update_NameDictionary',  type: 'rightHand', weight:  1.00000 },  // DO RIGHT HAND ACTION
                   { dest: 'goal',          mironName: 'get_PhaseOfDay',         type: 'internal',  weight:  1.00000 }], // DO INTERNAL ACTION
      },
      { // RULE 36 (n0::n0): MEISY ----> Allow all actions to be effective
        name: 'rule36',
        index: 36,
        fanIn:  [
                  [{ src:  'intention',     mironName: 'be_Alive',               type: 'signal',    weight:  1.00000 }], // IS SIGNAL RECOGNIZED
                ],
        fanOut:   [{ dest: 'activateWM',    mironName: 'perform_Speech',         type: 'canDo',     weight:  1.00000 },  // ACTIVATE WORKING MEMORY
                   { dest: 'activateWM',    mironName: 'perform_RightHand',      type: 'canDo',     weight:  1.00000 },  // ACTIVATE WORKING MEMORY
                   { dest: 'activateWM',    mironName: 'perform_LeftHand',       type: 'canDo',     weight:  1.00000 },  // ACTIVATE WORKING MEMORY
                   { dest: 'inhibitWM',     mironName: 'perform_InternalSpeech', type: 'canDo',     weight:  1.00000 },  // INHIBIT WORKING MEMORY
                   { dest: 'activateWM',    mironName: 'perform_Internal',       type: 'canDo',     weight:  1.00000 }], // ACTIVATE WORKING MEMORY
      },
      { // RULE 57 (n0::n16): MEISY ----> Wait for response
        name: 'rule57',
        index: 57,
        fanIn:  [
                  [{ src:  'actionDone',    mironName: 'say_MyName',             type: 'speech',    weight:  0.50000 },  // IS SPEECH DONE
                   { src:  'previousRule',  mironName: 'rule31',                 type: 'rule',      weight:  0.50000 }], // INTERNAL STATE MEISY
                ],
      },
  ];
}
